title: 我的游戏炸了，有大佬看得懂吗
txt_content:
[19:54:31] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod FMLCorePlugin (net.minecraftforge.fml.relauncher.FMLCorePlugin) is not signed!
[19:54:31] [main/WARN] [FML]: The coremod FMLForgePlugin (net.minecraftforge.classloading.FMLForgePlugin) is not signed!
[19:54:34] [main/ERROR] [FML]: FML appears to be missing any signature data. This is not a good thing
[19:54:42] [Client thread/ERROR] [minecraft/Minecraft]: Couldn't set pixel format

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
发完整一点
[Client thread/ERROR] [minecraft/Minecraft]: Couldn't set pixel format   
单看这句话 尝试更新一下显卡驱动？

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content:
同楼上，请上传完整的 LOG 文件。
LOG 文件的位置是 .minecraft/logs 文件夹。
可以考虑切换到另一张显卡上运行，具体操作根据你的电脑是 AMD 显卡还是 NVIDIA 显卡来确定。
